      • Quat_np

        public static javax.vecmath.AxisAngle4f Quat_np​(javax.vecmath.Quat4f q)
        Quat() function but just return the AxisAngle4f and hold the pool functionality. Slower, uses reflection, and creates stuff to garbage collect. DON'T USE THIS EXCEPT FOR THINGS THAT WILL ONLY RUN ONCE OR TWICE.

      • getOptionallyIntegratedStream

        public static InputStream getOptionallyIntegratedStream​(String resource,
                                                        String ends)
                                                 throws FileNotFoundException
        Get an InputStream but if the filename has " integrated" on the end it will fetch it from inside the jar.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • AxisAngle_np

        public static javax.vecmath.Quat4f AxisAngle_np​(javax.vecmath.AxisAngle4f i)
        AxisAngle() function but just return the AxisAngle4f and hold the pool functionality. Slower, uses reflection, and creates stuff to garbage collect. DON'T USE THIS EXCEPT FOR THINGS THAT WILL ONLY RUN ONCE OR TWICE.
